features: Closer, long-lasting shave*: Gillette’s Fusion5 Razor for men features 5 anti-friction blades (*Vs Mach3)
1 blade = 20 shaves: get up to 20 comfortable shaves from each Gillette's Fusion5 razor refill
Specially spaced larger lubrastrip for a seamless glide* (*vs previous Fusion5)
Precision trimmer: achieve a cleanly sculpted shave with the precision trimmer on the back
description: Product Description Get a closer, long-lasting shave* with the Gillette Fusion5 men's razor. Featuring an ergonomic razor handle to give you control, five anti-friction blades for a close shave, and a precision trimmer for hard-to-reach places.. The larger lubrication strip provides lubrication after the blades for smooth glide while you shave*. Concerned your Gillette handle won't fit? All Fusion5 blades fit all Gillette Fusion5 razor handles. Each refill lasts up to a month of shaves, giving you the ability to customise your shave and get the most out of every blade. (*vs previous Fusion5). Ingredients PEG-115M, PEG-7M, PEG-100, Silica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tris(Di-T-Butyl)Phosphite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, BHT Manufacturer Contact Information Procter & Gamble, 65823 Schwalbach/Ts., Germany See more
